com.example.link.appfuzzer

Class MyTimerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • com.example.link.appfuzzer.MyTimerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MyTimerTask
extends java.util.TimerTask
    Handles the timer management.

    • Method Detail

      • injectEventCaller

        public void injectEventCaller(android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityNodeInfo node)
        Injects actions into the supplied node using EventInjector.
        Cancels all timers, then injects and then starts a new timer with a fresh instance of MyTimerTask.
        Parameters:
        node - AccessibilityNodeInfo: The node to inject to.

      • run

        public void run()
        Called when the timer kicks in.

        Tries to get the lock, then finds the current root in the active window. If that fails, the android app overview is opened to force an AccessibilityEvent.
        If a current_root is found, the XMLDumper begins to write a timer event. Then injectEventCaller(AccessibilityNodeInfo)} is called.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Specified by:
        run in class java.util.TimerTask

      • cancelAllTimers

        public void cancelAllTimers()
        Cancels all timers.
